examples.example: 无论做什么事都要认真对待，千万不能马虎。

translate.english: No matter what you do, you should take it seriously and must not be careless.

examples.example: 无论遇到什么困难，我们都要保持乐观的心态，千万不能轻易放弃。

translate.english: No matter what difficulties we encounter, we should keep an optimistic attitude and must not give up easily.

examples.example: 无论前方道路多么崎岖，我们千万要坚定信念勇往直前。

translate.english: No matter how rugged the road ahead is, we must firmly hold our beliefs and move forward bravely.
